key_findings: Comprehensive BDD coverage via Cucumber with 25 feature files
25 unit test files covering managers, datastore, and utilities
Tests run in parallel in CI (7 feature groups + 2 unit test jobs)
Docker-based feature testing for environment parity
Post-deploy testing in dev and preprod environments
Limited middleware and external service integration test coverage
Strong coverage for entry creation and scoring flows
Testing gaps in error handling, security, and performance scenarios
